```{r start}
#| warning: false
library(tidyverse) |> suppressPackageStartupMessages()
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r beautiful-graph}

mtcars |>
  # Convert cyl to a factor for discrete coloring
  mutate(cyl = factor(cyl)) |>
  ggplot(aes(x = hp, y = mpg, color = cyl, size = wt)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.8) +                 # semi‑transparent points
  scale_color_brewer(palette = "Set2") +    # pleasant colour palette
  scale_size_continuous(range = c(2, 6)) +  # sensible point sizes
  labs(
    title = "Fuel Efficiency vs. Engine Power",
    subtitle = "mtcars dataset – points sized by weight",
    x = "Horsepower (hp)",
    y = "Miles per Gallon (mpg)",
    color = "Cylinders",
    size = "Weight (1000 lbs)"
  ) +
  theme_minimal(base_family = "Helvetica") +   # clean minimal theme
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(face = "bold", size = 16),
    plot.subtitle = element_text(size = 12),
    legend.position = "right"
  )
```
